answers.answer: HiHave you been having weight problems lately?A dark lining on the neck may suggest weight problems such as obesity. This is likely suggestive of other metabolic disorders like diabetes. I would advise that you have your fasting blood glucose checked. If you are overweight ,then it would be best to maintain an exercise regimen that would keep the weight down.

question: My neck started getting a black line like if it was dirty or like if i did not take showers, now i am getting black dots like if it was an old pimple or acne, now it is starting to itch and i am afraid and embarased that someone sees my neck like this please Doctor what can i do?
title: dark neck
